name: 程式設計（二）
description: 此課程為程式設計(一)的延續課程，此課程的目標是要培養學生程式設計的進階觀念及能力，在此課程中，學生將會學習到不同的程式函式庫及整合不同函式庫解決問題及開發應用程式。
goals: 能了解 Python程式設計的基本概念及技能並撰寫程式
能根據指定的方法步驟，規畫程式架構、流程並據以實作。
能熟悉不同的函式庫，及整合函式庫解決問題及發展應用程式
syllabus:
Computer Programming II is a follow-up course of the Computer Programming I for the undergraduate students majored in learning science. The goal of Computer Programming II is to prepare students for advanced concepts of computer programming such as objective-oriented programming and more abstract data types in Python. In this course, students will learn how to utilize Python modules to analyze spreadsheet data and to implement data visualization. A final project will be required for all students in this course. 

Week 1: Introduction

Week 2: Abstract Data Types and Objected-Oriented Programming

Week 3: Data Manipulations with NumPy

Week 4: Data Manipulations with NumPy

Week 5: Quiz 1

Week 6: Working on Spreadsheet Data

Week 7: Data Manipulations with Pandas

Week 8: Data Manipulations with Pandas

Week 9: Quiz 2

Week 10:  Data Visualization

Week 11:  Visualization with Matplotlib

Week 12: Visualization with Matplotlib

Week 13: Quiz 3

Week 14:  Final Project

Week 15:  Final Project

Week 16:  Final Project

Week 17: Final Project

以解決問題為導向的程式設計，強調自我導向學習

期末報告以小組專題研究的方式進行
